Docs.summary: Allows applications to add data to the system search index.

remarks.para: Spotlight is the system search technology on iOS and OS X. CoreSpotlight allows developers to add data to the search index. An app about the periodic table, for instance, could index the various elements and bring up the relevant page after a search.
